subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Semyon Varlamov of Colorado, Ben Bishop of Tampa Bay and Tuukka Rask of Boston are finalists for the Vezina Trophy, given to the N.H.L.’s top goalie.
snippet: Semyon Varlamov of Colorado, Ben Bishop of Tampa Bay and Tuukka Rask of Boston are finalists for the Vezina Trophy, given to the N.H.L.’s top goalie.
